description:
This is a small horror game about brutalist architecture in Ukraine.

In Brutalism22 you are playing as a regular supermarket worker who is at the workplace, and of a sudden, bombs start to drop. So you are trying to escape the city under attack with his dog, his neighbor, and her daughter.

Game features:
-Unique brutalist architecture
-Retro style Eastern Europe cities and towns.
-Scary monsters
-Several grim, intense locations
-Cute dog
name: Brutalism22
